channel.title: Lahman on DataScience
channel.description: Recent content in Lahman on DataScience

item.title: Data Visualization
item.description: Data Visualization Data visualization is a general term that describes any effort to help people understand the significance of data by placing it in a visual context. Patterns, trends and correlations that might go undetected in text-based data can be exposed and recognized easier. Here we will explore following libraries dplyr , Lahman , ggplot2 and ggiraph Lets fetch data from Lahman database about all the players whose Home runs are more than 400 and store it in a data frame df.
